meanings.definition: A type of sea turtle with a narrow head and a hooked beak.
meanings.sent1: The hawksbill swam gracefully through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: The hawksbill is an endangered species due to habitat loss.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hawksbill bring a suitcase to the beach? To shell-ebrate its vacation!
meanings.sent4: The hawksbill's beak is like a sharp hook, ready to catch its prey.
meanings.sent5: Children at the aquarium were amazed by the hawksbill's unique appearance.

meanings.definition: A type of tortoiseshell material used in making jewelry and other items.
meanings.sent1: The necklace was made from exquisite hawksbill.
meanings.sent2: Artisans crafted beautiful earrings from hawksbill.
meanings.sent3: Why did the hawksbill material go to school? To become a smart accessory!
meanings.sent4: The hawksbill material shimmered like a precious gem in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The hawksbill material added a touch of elegance to the jewelry collection.
